text: \\n\\nVanilla UI Base Value: [[col:yellow]]%d[[/col]]\\nVanilla UI Display Value: [[col:yellow]]%d[[/col]]

\\n\\nBlocks a random %% in range [%f*armour, armour] (max 100%%) of incoming:\\n[[img:ui/skins/default/icon_stat_damage_base.png]][[/img]] Base Weapon Damage\\n[[img:ui/skins/default/icon_stat_ranged_damage_base.png]][[/img]] Base Missile Damage\\n[[img:ui/skins/default/icon_explosive_damage.png]][[/img]] Base Explosive Damage\\nMod shows the [[col:yellow]]average[[/col]] reduction from armour.

\\n\\n[[img:ui/mod/icons/icon_stat_defence_rear.png]][[/img]]Melee Defence from rear: [[col:red]]-%d%%[[/col]]\\n[[img:ui/mod/icons/icon_stat_defence_flank.png]][[/img]]Melee Defence from flanks: [[col:red]]-%d%%[[/col]]
